verse: आवयोर्भेदबुद्धिम् वै य: करोति नराधम: । तस्य वास: कालसूत्रे यावच्चन्द्रदिवाकरौ ।

terms.आवयोः (aavayoḥ): a compound of two words - "āvaya" meaning 'two' and "āvayoḥ" meaning 'of the two' (locative case)
terms.भेदबुद्धिम् (bheda: buddhim) - a compound word - "bheda" meaning 'difference' and "buddhim" meaning 'perception'
terms.नराधमः (nara: adhamaḥ) - a compound word - "nara" meaning 'person/human' and "adhamaḥ" meaning 'wretched/inferior'
terms.कालसूत्रे (kāla: sūtre) - a compound word - "kāla" meaning 'time' and "sūtre" meaning 'in a space of'
terms.चन्द्रदिवाकरौ (chandra: divākarau) - a compound word - "chandra" meaning 'moon' and "divākarau" meaning 'sun'

meaning: Meaning:A person who perceives differences between the two (entities) indeed, the wretched person's dwelling remains confined to the realm of time until the moon and the sun (exist).
